Uses of Interface
com.opower.hadoop.hbase.query.Query

Packages that use Query
com.opower.hadoop.hbase.query A query engine for HBase, providing SQL-like access to HBase. 
 

Uses of Query in com.opower.hadoop.hbase.query
 

Classes in com.opower.hadoop.hbase.query that implement Query
 class DefaultQuery
          Default implementation of a Query, which collaborates with the DefaultQueryPlanner
